notables.name: Untiring
mods: 40% increased Life Regeneration rate
1.5% of Physical Damage prevented from Hits in the past10 seconds is Regenerated as Life per second
juggernaut_phys_damage_prevented_as_life_regen

notables.name: Unstoppable
mods: 10% increased Movement Speed
Cannot be Stunned
Action Speed cannot be modified to below Base Value
Movement Speed cannot be modified to below Base Value

notables.name: Unbreakable
mods: Armour from Equipped Body Armour is doubled
15% of Armour also applies to Chaos Damage taken from Hits

notables.name: Undeniable
mods: +500 to Accuracy Rating
1% increased Attack Speed per 150 Accuracy Rating
Gain Accuracy Rating equal to twice your Strength

notables.name: Unflinching
mods: 30% chance to gain an Endurance Charge when you are Hit
25% chance that if you would gain Endurance Charges, you instead gain up to maximum Endurance Charges
Gain 1 Endurance Charge every second if you've been Hit Recently
+1 to Maximum Endurance Charges
(Recently refers to the past 4 seconds)

notables.name: Unrelenting
mods: 1% additional Physical Damage Reduction per Endurance Charge
1% additional Elemental Damage Reduction per Endurance Charge

notables.name: Unyielding
mods: 8% increased Damage per Endurance Charge
6% increased Area of Effect per Endurance Charge
25% chance to gain an Endurance Charge when you Stun an Enemy
10% increased Stun Duration on Enemies per Endurance Charge

notables.name: Ancestral Fury
mods: Strike Skills also target the previous location they were used

notables.name: Crave the Slaughter
mods: Every Rage also grants 1% increased Attack Speed
Inherent Rage Loss starts 2 seconds later
(This only affects the inherent loss of Rage when you haven't been Hit or gained Rage Recently)
(Every Rage grants 1% more Attack Damage. Maximum Rage is 30. Lose 10 Rage per second if you have not been Hit or gained Rage in the last 2 seconds)

notables.name: Aspect of Carnage
mods: 10% increased Damage taken
40% more Damage

notables.name: Gore Dancer
mods: 30% of Life Leech is Instant

notables.name: War Bringer
mods: Warcries Exert twice as many Attacks

notables.name: Rite of Ruin
mods: Lose 0.1% of Life per second per Rage while you are not losing Rage
50% increased Rage Effect
(Every Rage has an inherent effect of 1% more Attack Damage, and modifiers can add extra effects to Rage)

notables.name: Defy Pain
mods: Gain Defiance for 10 seconds on losing Life to an Enemy Hit, nomore than once every 0.3 seconds
Lose all Defiance when you reach 10 Defiance
Gain 3% of Missing Unreserved Life before being Hit by an Enemy Per Defiance

notables.name: Tasalio, Cleansing Water
mods: Modifiers to Fire Resistance also apply to Cold and Lightning Resistances at 50% of their Value
Unaffected by Ignite
(Debuffs you are Unaffected by can still be placed on you, but will not actually apply their effect)

notables.name: Tukohama, Wars Herald
mods: Skills from Equipped Body Armour are Supported by Level 30 Ancestral Call
Skills from Equipped Body Armour are Supported by Level 20 Fist of War

notables.name: Ramako, Suns Light
mods: Nearby Enemy Monsters' Fire Resistance againstDamage over Time is -20% while you are Stationary
Nearby Enemy Monsters have no Fire Resistance againstDamage over Time while you are Stationary

notables.name: Valako, Storms Embrace
mods: Modifiers to Maximum Fire Resistance also apply to Maximum Cold and Lightning Resistances

notables.name: Sione, Suns Roar
mods: 30% increased Warcry Buff Effect
Warcries have infinite Power
(Normal Monsters have 1 Power, Magic Monsters 2, Rare Monsters 10, Unique Monsters 20, and Players 5)

notables.name: Ngamahu, Flames Advance
mods: Non-Unique Jewels cause Increases and Reductions to other Damage Types in a Large Radius to be Transformed to apply to Fire Damage
Non-Unique Jewels cause Small and Notable Passive Skills in a Large Radius toalso grant +4 to Strength
(Passive Skills that are not Notable, Masteries, Keystones, or Jewel Sockets are Small)

notables.name: Hinekora, Deaths Fury
mods: Enemies you or your Totems Kill have 5% chance to Explode, dealing 500% of their maximum Life as Fire Damage
